name: Bubble Girl
description:
Bubble Girl is a fun casual bubble shooter game. Shoot and pop bubbles to collect stars , and you will unlock new levels filled with more challenges!
Please install DLC, it will make this game more interesting.

Features:
1.Inspired by the best arcade games and the smartest puzzle games, Bubble Girl presents a fun, challenging and addicting new way to have a blast with bubbles.
2.40 levels of Challenging Puzzles!
3.Use Fire,Grow,Water and Triple Bubbles to blast through the level!
4.Puzzle games have you on edge? Don’t get angry – Press the ‘G’key to get powered up bubbles!

Thank you very much for supporting our game.
If you like it, please recommend it, thank you!
